author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

At one point, climate alarmists warned that the Earth would get so hot, humanity wouldn’t survive. That never happened. In fact, even left-leaning media now admit we’re in a “cooling period.” This is why, instead of pushing global warming, they’ve shifted to calling it “climate change” — as if the climate hasn’t always been changing.

Calling anyone who disagrees with the left on this issue a conspiracy theorist who doesn’t believe in weather is disingenuous, which is exactly why Joe Rogan had no choice but to fact-check Bernie Sanders into oblivion.

NEW: Joe Rogan fact checks Senator Bernie S
title: Joe Rogan busts Bernie Sanders, fact checks him on the alleged climate change "experts"

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Tim Young transformed Trump’s AOC rant into a Star Wars-style opening crawl, and it’s definitely worth watching.

You didn’t know you needed this, but trust me, you definitely did.

I made Trump's epic takedown of AOC into the opening credits of Star Wars... because it fit perfectly.

This is pretty incredible. 🤣😂 pic.twitter.com/kz4LhDhMv6
— Tim Young (@TimRunsHisMouth) June 24, 2025
title: Trump drops EPIC rant against Rep. AOC, and someone turned it into the Star Wars theme

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
From Climate Change to COVID to WWIII, the left is never held accountable when nearly none of their predictions come to fruition. Today’s show breaks down how this phenomenon is becoming far too common on the right.

"It never comes true, and they are never held to account because it's a worldview with no fundamental moral backbone. It's just 'this is bad, that is bad,' and progress for the sake of progress. They're never held accountable,” Crowder said. “And we have that emerging on the Right because these
title: Watch: You've Been Lied To... and Crowder Called It

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Whether or not you agree with Trump’s response in Iran is besides the point when it comes to Elizabeth Warren, or as some of you know her as Pocahontas, as she lectured the masses from a podium dedicated to taking the lives of unborn babies.

NEW: Elizabeth Warren lectures President Trump about putting "lives at risk" by striking Iran while speaking behind a Planned Parenthood podium.

"It only takes a simple majority to reel back in Trump and make clear to the world that the U.S. is not going to war..."

402,200… pic.twitter.com/961ZCAygiz

title: Elizabeth Warren goes on warpath about Donald Trump putting "lives at risk..." while she is speaking at Planned Parenthood

author: Brodigan
description:
It’s been three days since the United States wiped out Iran’s nuclear program, and we still aren’t in World War III. Iran launched a few missiles to save face, but only after warning everyone they were going to do it. Everything was shot down, no casualties. Now it’s time to call some people to the mat about their comments and allegations surrounding Trump’s military action. Let’s see who’s on the list.

CEASEFIRE?

  • "It has been fully agreed by and between Israel and Iran that there will be..."
title: 🔴 Watch! You've Been Lied To...

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

The phrase "go touch grass" gets thrown around a lot these days, though not nearly as much. You may find yourself wondering if you need to log off of the internet and go touch grass, so I hope this helps. If you find yourself like this lady filming a TikTok at work about how you aren't sure how you can be expected to work because Donald Trump did a thing, the answer is yes.

Standard viral video rules apply. I'm not sure who this woman is or where this video originated, except that it appears to be from an Amazon warehouse. But it's going viral and people are engagement farming it, plus I think there is a teachable moment here.

We're also unclear whether the
title: Woke Amazon worker has a nutty, isn't sure how to do her job without "crashing out" over Trump bombing Iran

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Be honest. If you heard Florida was building an ICE detention center in the middle of the Everglades and DIDN'T call it "Alligator Alcatraz," you'd be disappointed. Thankfully, Attorney General James Uthmeier is concerned for your amusement as well as Donald Trump's mass deportations, as he announced the new, efficient, and low-cost detention center surrounded by nature's security detail.

Welcome to Alligator Alcatraz!

"You don't need to invest that much in the perimeter. If people get out, there's not much waiting for them other than alligators and pythons. Nowhere to go. Nowhere to hide."
title: Florida announces illegal immigrant detention center surrounded by gators, and of course it's called "Alligator Alcatraz"
